meta.scene_intent: Rare quality dark steel curved blade with blue glowing runes and skull pommel. This is a dungeon drop — a weapon with real power and sinister personality. The blue rune glow and skull pommel evoke death knight or shadow warrior aesthetics. The curved blade suggests Eastern or demonic influence. The blue rare border glow must pop against the dark background. A weapon players would screenshot and show off.

subjects.element: Dark steel curved blade with blue runes and skull pommel — rare quality
subjects.details: A menacing curved sword approximately 100cm in total length, forged from dark blued steel that appears almost black. The blade has a pronounced curve reminiscent of a bastardized scimitar or tachi, single-edged with a wickedly sharp convex cutting edge and a reinforced spine. The steel itself has a dark blue-black patina with subtle swirling patterns in the metal — suggesting it was quenched in something other than water. Carved into both flats of the blade are runic inscriptions — seven distinct runes on each side, each approximately 15mm tall, cut deep into the steel and filled with a self-luminous blue magical energy (#0070dd). The runes pulse with a slow, steady rhythm like a heartbeat, casting shifting blue light onto the blade surface and creating small caustic light patterns. Faint wisps of blue energy (#4a9eff) trail upward from the topmost runes like cold flame. The crossguard is fashioned from dark iron wrought into the shape of two stylized bat wings or demonic pinions, sweeping forward and downward with sharp pointed tips. The grip is wrapped in black leather over what appears to be a bone core — the texture suggests dried sinew binding rather than conventional stitching. The pommel is a finely detailed human skull carved from aged ivory or bone, approximately 30mm across. The skull's eye sockets are hollow but emit a faint blue luminescence matching the blade runes, suggesting the enchantment permeates the entire weapon. The jaw is clenched, the expression frozen in a silent scream. Small cracks web across the skull surface, dark with age.
subjects.scale: Weapon fills approximately 80% of the square frame, oriented diagonally from lower-left to upper-right, with the blade curve creating a menacing silhouette

camera.shot_type: Flat icon view with slight 3/4 angle — standard WoW inventory icon perspective
camera.angle: Very slight 3/4 rotation (approximately 10-15 degrees) to reveal the blade curve depth, crossguard wing dimensionality, and skull pommel facial features
camera.lens_equivalent: Orthographic / flat projection — no perspective distortion, game UI icon convention
camera.focal_point: The cluster of brightest blue runes at the blade's midpoint — the strongest light source and the visual hook that communicates 'this weapon is enchanted'
camera.depth_of_field: Infinite — everything in perfect focus, UI icon convention
composition_rules: Weapon centered in frame, filling approximately 80% of the square canvas
Diagonal orientation lower-left to upper-right, blade curve sweeping toward upper-right corner
Blue rune glow creates a luminous spine along the blade center that guides the eye from pommel to tip
Skull pommel in lower-left quadrant as a secondary focal point
Dark gradient background: darkest at edges, slightly illuminated at center by the rune glow
Single weapon only — no hands, no characters, no environmental context

lighting.key_light: The runes themselves serve as the primary light source — blue magical luminescence (#0070dd) emanating from the carved inscriptions, casting shifting blue light across the blade surface and creating rim lighting on the crossguard wings and grip
lighting.fill_light: Very dim cool ambient from upper-left (#3a3a4a), just enough to define the dark steel blade edges and crossguard shape where the rune light doesn't reach
accent_lights: Blue runic glow — each of the 14 runes (7 per side) emits a steady blue light (#0070dd core, #4a9eff at the brightest emission points) that illuminates the blade flats with shifting caustic patterns
Skull pommel eye-glow — faint blue luminescence from the hollow eye sockets, creating two tiny blue pinpoints that echo the blade runes
Faint blue energy wisps — thin tendrils of #4a9eff light trailing upward from the blade runes like cold ethereal flame
Rare-quality blue glow (#0070dd at 25-30% opacity) as a backlight halo around the entire weapon silhouette — stronger than the uncommon green aura
lighting.shadows: Deep shadows on the blade's non-lit side, with blue rune light creating hard-edged runic shadow patterns. The crossguard bat-wings cast small pointed shadows downward onto the grip. The skull pommel has dramatic blue-lit shadows in the eye sockets, nasal cavity, and beneath the cheekbones.
atmospheric_fx: Dark gradient background: radial gradient from #111122 at center to #080810 at corners, with a distinct blue tint from the rune illumination
Blue magical wisps: thin threads of luminous blue energy (#4a9eff at varying opacity) curling upward from the blade runes like heat distortion or spectral flame — 3-5 wisps visible
Faint blue caustic light patterns on the blade surface — the rune glow refracting through the enchantment creates shifting ripple-like highlights
Blue border glow (#0070dd at 25-30% opacity) around the weapon's silhouette edge — the rare quality aura
Subtle painterly grain texture in the dark background
